titleStmt.title: Two sermons preached in St. Maries Church in Cambridge. By Robert Sheringham, Master of Arts, and Fellow of Gunvil and Caius Colledge.
titleStmt.author: Sheringham, Robert, 1602-1678.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iames Young, and are to be sold by John Williams, at the signe of the Crowne in Pauls Church-yard.,
